Direct evidential

\((\mathcal{M})\) Model
\(w_0\) \(w_1\) \(w_2\) \(w_3\) \(w_4\)
Ann (a) sang 1 1 1 0 0
Speaker is sure that Ann sang 0 0 1 1 0
Speaker heard that Ann sang 0 1 1 0 0
Speaker is sure Ann didnâ€™t sing 0 1 0 0 0

\(\begin{array}{ll} (c_0) & ^{st}p_{0-3} := ^{\chi}\{\langle\langle w,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle\rangle\rangle\;|\;w\in ^{\{\}}p_{0-3}\} \\ =: & c_0 \\ & \langle\langle w_0,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle\rangle\rangle \\ & \langle\langle w_1,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle\rangle\rangle \\ & \langle\langle w_2,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle\rangle\rangle \\ & \langle\langle w_3,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle\rangle\rangle \\ \end{array}\)

\(\begin{array}{ll} \textrm{CG}(c_0) & \textrm{Common Ground} \\ = & \{[\![\top\omega]\!](i)\;|\;i\in ^{\{\}}c_0\} \\ = & \{w_0,w_1,w_2,w_3\} \\ \end{array}\)

(1) Ann sang, I'm sure.

\(\begin{array}{llll} (1') & ^{\top}[x\;|\;x=\mathbf{a}]; & [w\;|\;sang_{\top\omega}\langle\top\delta\rangle]; & [p\;|\;p=\bot\omega\parallel] \\ & c_1 & c_2 & c_3 \\ & \langle\langle a,w_0,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle\rangle\rangle & \langle\langle a,w_0,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle w_0\rangle\rangle & \langle\langle a,w_0,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle p_{0-2},w_0\rangle\rangle \\ & & \langle\langle a,w_0,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle w_1\rangle\rangle & \langle\langle a,w_0,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle p_{0-2},w_1\rangle\rangle \\ & & \langle\langle a,w_0,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle w_2\rangle\rangle & \langle\langle a,w_0,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle p_{0-2},w_2\rangle\rangle \\ & \langle\langle a,w_1,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle\rangle\rangle & \langle\langle a,w_1,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle w_0\rangle\rangle & \langle\langle a,w_1,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle p_{0-2},w_0\rangle\rangle \\ & & \langle\langle a,w_1,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle w_1\rangle\rangle & \langle\langle a,w_1,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle p_{0-2},w_1\rangle\rangle \\ & & \langle\langle a,w_1,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle w_2\rangle\rangle & \langle\langle a,w_1,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle p_{0-2},w_2\rangle\rangle \\ & \langle\langle a,w_2,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle\rangle\rangle & \langle\langle a,w_2,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle w_0\rangle\rangle & \langle\langle a,w_2,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle p_{0-2},w_0\rangle\rangle \\ & & \langle\langle a,w_2,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle w_1\rangle\rangle & \langle\langle a,w_2,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle p_{0-2},w_1\rangle\rangle \\ & & \langle\langle a,w_2,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle w_2\rangle\rangle & \langle\langle a,w_2,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle p_{0-2},w_2\rangle\rangle \\ & \langle\langle a,w_3,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle\rangle\rangle & \langle\langle a,w_3,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle w_0\rangle\rangle & \langle\langle a,w_3,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle p_{0-2},w_0\rangle\rangle \\ & & \langle\langle a,w_3,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle w_1\rangle\rangle & \langle\langle a,w_3,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle p_{0-2},w_1\rangle\rangle \\ & & \langle\langle a,w_3,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle w_2\rangle\rangle & \langle\langle a,w_3,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle p_{0-2},w_2\rangle\rangle \\ \end{array}\)

\(\begin{array}{lllll} (1'') & [\mathbb{crt}_{\top\omega}\langle sp,\bot\Omega\rangle]; & [\bot\omega\in\top\omega\parallel]; & [\top\omega\in\bot\omega\parallel]; & ^{\top}[p\;|\;p=\top\omega\parallel] \\ & c_4 & c_5 & c_6 & c_7 \\ & \langle\langle a,w_2,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle p_{0-2},w_0\rangle\rangle & & & \\ & \langle\langle a,w_2,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle p_{0-2},w_1\rangle\rangle & & & \\ & \langle\langle a,w_2,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle p_{0-2},w_2\rangle\rangle & \langle\langle a,w_2,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle p_{0-2},w_2\rangle\rangle & \langle\langle a,w_2,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle p_{0-2},w_2\rangle\rangle & \langle\langle p_2,a,w_2,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle p_{0-2},w_2\rangle\rangle \\ & \langle\langle a,w_3,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle p_{0-2},w_0\rangle\rangle & & & \\ & \langle\langle a,w_3,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle p_{0-2},w_1\rangle\rangle & & & \\ & \langle\langle a,w_3,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle p_{0-2},w_2\rangle\rangle & \langle\langle a,w_3,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle p_{0-2},w_2\rangle\rangle & & \\ \end{array}\)

\(\begin{array}{llll} \textrm{CG}(c_1) & = & \{w_0,w_1,w_2,w_3\} & \\ \textrm{CG}(c_2) & = & \{w_0,w_1,w_2,w_3\} & \\ \textrm{CG}(c_3) & = & \{w_0,w_1,w_2,w_3\} & \\ \textrm{CG}(c_4) & = & \{w_2,w_3\} & \mathbb{Informative} \\ \textrm{CG}(c_5) & = & \{w_2,w_3\} & \\ \textrm{CG}(c_6) & = & \{w_2\} & \mathbb{Informative} \\ \textrm{CG}(c_7) & = & \{w_2\} & \\ \end{array}\)

\(\begin{array}{ll} & \top_{\mathcal{M},c_0}(1';1'') \\ = & \{(j_1)_1\;|\;\exists i\in ^{\{\}}c_0\forall g: i\prec j\;\&\;j\in ^{\{\}}c_0[\![(1');(1'')]\!]^g\} \\ = & \{(j_1)_1\;|\;\exists i\in ^{\{\}}c_0\forall g: i\prec j\;\&\;j\in ^{\{\}}c_7\} \\ = & \{p_2\} \\ := & w_2 \\ \end{array}\)

Detailed derivations

\(\begin{array}{rlr} (c_1) & c_0[\![^{\top}[x\;|\;x=\mathbf{a}]]\!]^g \\ := & [\![\lambda I\lambda j\exists x\exists i(j=(x \,^{\top}\oplus i)\wedge Ii\wedge x=\mathbf{a})]\!]^g(c_0) & A2,c[\![\cdot]\!]^g \\ = & [\![\lambda j\exists x\exists i(j=(x ^{\top}\oplus i)\wedge Ii\wedge x=\mathbf{a})]\!]^{g[I/c_0]} & D2.2.\lambda \\ = & ^{\chi}\{j\;|\;\exists a\exists i(j=\langle a\cdot i_1,i_2\rangle\;\&\; i\in ^{\{\}}c_0\;\&\; a=[\![\mathbf{a}]\!]\} & D2.2,D2.1 \\ = & ^{\chi}\{\langle a\cdot i_1,i_2\rangle\;|\; i\in ^{\{\}}c_0\;\&\; a=[\![\mathbf{a}]\!]\} & df.\{-|-\} \\ = & ^{\chi}\{\langle\langle a,w,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle\rangle\rangle\;|\; w\in ^{\{\}}p_{0-3}\;\&\; a=[\![\mathbf{a}]\!]\} & c_0:= ^{st}p_{0-3},df.\;\cdot \\ =: & c_1 & \\ \end{array}\)

\(\begin{array}{rlr} (c_2) & c_1[\![[w\;|\;sang_{\top\omega}\langle\top\delta\rangle]]\!]^g \\ := & [\![\lambda I\lambda j\exists w\exists i(j=(w \,^{\bot}\oplus i)\wedge Ii\wedge sang(w,\top\delta_i)]\!]^g(c_1) & A2,c[\![\cdot]\!]^g \\ = & [\![\lambda j\exists w\exists i(j=(w \,^{\bot}\oplus i)\wedge Ii\wedge sang(w,\top\delta_i)]\!]^{g[I/c_1]} & D2.2.\lambda \\ = & ^{\chi}\{j\;|\;\exists w\exists i(j=\langle i_1,w\cdot i_2\rangle \;\&\; i\in ^{\{\}}c_1 \;\&\; [\![\top\delta]\!](i)\in ^{\{\}}[\![sang]\!](w)\} & D2.2,D2.1 \\ = & ^{\chi}\{\langle i_1,w\cdot i_2\rangle\;|\;i\in ^{\{\}}c_1 \;\&\; (i_1)_{\delta}\in ^{\{\}}[\![sang]\!](w)\} & D2.1.i.[\![\top a_n]\!]\\ = & ^{\chi}\{\langle\langle a,w,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle v\rangle\rangle \;|\;w\in ^{\{\}}p_{0-3}\;\&\; a=[\![\mathbf{a}]\!]\;\&\; ((\langle\langle a,w,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle v\rangle\rangle)_1)_{\delta}\in ^{\{\}}[\![sang]\!](v)\} & df. c_1 \\ = & ^{\chi}\{\langle\langle a,w,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle v\rangle\rangle \;|\;w\in ^{\{\}}p_{0-3}\;\&\; a=[\![\mathbf{a}]\!]\;\&\; (\langle a,w,p_{0-3}\rangle)_{\delta}\in ^{\{\}}[\![sang]\!](v)\} & (\cdot)_n \\ = & ^{\chi}\{\langle\langle a,w,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle v\rangle\rangle \;|\;w\in ^{\{\}}p_{0-3}\;\&\; a=[\![\mathbf{a}]\!]\;\&\; a\in ^{\{\}}[\![sang]\!](v)\} & (\cdot)_{\delta} \\ =: & c_2 & \\ \end{array}\)

\(\begin{array}{rlr} (c_3) & c_2[\![[p\;|\;p=\bot\omega\parallel]]\!]^g \\ := & [\![\lambda I\lambda j\exists p\exists i(j=(p \,^{\bot}\oplus i)\wedge Ii\wedge p=\bot\omega\{I\})]\!]^g(c_2) & A2,c[\![\cdot]\!]^g \\ = & [\![\lambda j\exists p\exists i(j=(p \,^{\bot}\oplus i)\wedge Ii\wedge p=\bot\omega\{I\})]\!]^{g[I/c_2]} & D2.2.\lambda \\ = & ^{\chi}\{j\;|\;\exists q\exists i(j=\langle i_1,q\cdot i_2\rangle \;\&\; i\in ^{\{\}}c_2 \;\&\; q= ^{\chi}\{[\![\bot\omega]\!](k)\;|\;k\in ^{\{\}}c_2\}\} & D2.2,D2.1 \\ = & ^{\chi}\{\langle i_1,q\cdot i_2\rangle\;|\;i\in ^{\{\}}c_2 \;\&\; q= ^{\chi}\{(k_2)_{\omega}\;|\;k\in ^{\{\}}~c_2\}\} & df.\{-|-\}, D2.1.i.[\![\bot a_n]\!]\\ = & ^{\chi}\{\langle\langle a,w,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle q,v\rangle\rangle \;|\;w\in ^{\{\}}p_{0-3}\;\&\; a=[\![\mathbf{a}]\!]\;\&\; a\in ^{\{\}}[\![sang]\!](v) \;\&\; & \\ & q=\{(\langle\langle a,w,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle q,v\rangle\rangle)_1)_{\omega}\;|\; w\in ^{\{\}}p_{0-3}\;\&\; a=[\![\mathbf{a}]\!]\;\&\; a\in ^{\{\}}[\![sang]\!](v)\}\} & df. c_1 \\ = & ^{\chi}\{\langle\langle a,w,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle v\rangle\rangle \;|\;w\in ^{\{\}}p_{0-3}\;\&\; a=[\![\mathbf{a}]\!]\;\&\; a\in ^{\{\}}[\![sang]\!](v) \;\&\;& \\ & q=\{(\langle v\rangle)_{\omega}\;|\; w\in ^{\{\}}p_{0-3}\;\&\; a=[\![\mathbf{a}]\!]\;\&\; a\in ^{\{\}}[\![sang]\!](v)\}\} & (\cdot)_n \\ = & ^{\chi}\{\langle\langle a,w,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle q,v\rangle\rangle \;|\;w\in ^{\{\}}p_{0-3}\;\&\; a=[\![\mathbf{a}]\!]\;\&\; a\in ^{\{\}}[\![sang]\!](v) \;\&\;& \\ & q=\{v\;|\; w\in ^{\{\}}p_{0-3}\;\&\; a=[\![\mathbf{a}]\!]\;\&\; a\in ^{\{\}}[\![sang]\!](v)\}\} & (\cdot)_{\omega} \\ = & ^{\chi}\{\langle\langle a,w,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle q,v\rangle\rangle \;|\;w\in ^{\{\}}p_{0-3}\;\&\; a=[\![\mathbf{a}]\!]\;\&\; a\in ^{\{\}}[\![sang]\!](v)\;\&\; & \\ & q=\{w'\in\mathcal{D}_{\omega}\;|\; a\in ^{\{\}}[\![sang]\!](w')\}\} & simp. \\ = & ^{\chi}\{\langle\langle a,w,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle p_{0-2},v\rangle\rangle \;|\;w\in ^{\{\}}p_{0-3}\;\&\; a=[\![\mathbf{a}]\!]\;\&\;a\in ^{\{\}}[\![sang]\!](v)\} & df. p_{0-2} \\ =: & c_3 & \\ \end{array}\)

\(\begin{array}{rlr} (c_4) & c_3[\![[\mathbb{crt}_{\top\omega}\langle sp,\bot\Omega\rangle]]\!]^g \\ := & [\![\lambda I\lambda j(Ij\wedge \mathbb{crt}(\top\omega(j),sp(j),\bot\Omega(j)))]\!]^g(c_3) & A2,c[\![\cdot]\!]^g \\ = & [\![\lambda j(Ij\wedge \mathbb{crt}(\top\omega(j),sp(j),\bot\Omega(j)))]\!]^{g[I/c_3]} & D2.2.\lambda \\ = & ^{\chi}\{j\;|\;j\in ^{\{\}}c_3 \;\&\; \langle [\![sp]\!](j),[\![\bot\Omega]\!](j)\rangle\in ^{\{\}}[\![\mathbb{crt}]\!]([\![\top\omega]\!](j))\} & D2.2,D2.1 \\ = & ^{\chi}\{j\;|\;j\in ^{\{\}}c_3 \;\&\; \langle [\![sp]\!],(j_2)_{\Omega}\rangle\in ^{\{\}}[\![\mathbb{crt}]\!]((j_1)_{\omega})\} & df.\{-|-\}, D2.1.i.[\![\bot a_n]\!], \\ & & D2.1.i.[\![\top a_n]\!]\\ = & ^{\chi}\{\langle\langle a,w,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle p_{0-2},v\rangle\rangle \;|\;w\in ^{\{\}}p_{0-3}\;\&\; a=[\![\mathbf{a}]\!]\;\&\;a\in ^{\{\}}[\![sang]\!](v) \;\&\; & \\ & \langle [\![sp]\!],((\langle\langle a,w,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle p_{0-2},v\rangle\rangle)_2)_{\Omega}\rangle\in ^{\{\}}[\![\mathbb{crt}]\!](((\langle\langle a,w,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle p_{0-2},v\rangle\rangle)_1)_{\omega})\} & df. c_3 \\ = & ^{\chi}\{\langle\langle a,w,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle p_{0-2},v\rangle\rangle \;|\;w\in ^{\{\}}p_{0-3}\;\&\; a=[\![\mathbf{a}]\!]\;\&\;a\in ^{\{\}}[\![sang]\!](v) \;\&\; & \\ & \langle [\![sp]\!],(\langle p_{0-2},v\rangle)_{\Omega}\rangle\in ^{\{\}}[\![\mathbb{crt}]\!]((\langle a,w,p_{0-3}\rangle)_{\omega})\} & (\cdot)_n \\ = & ^{\chi}\{\langle\langle a,w,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle p_{0-2},v\rangle\rangle \;|\;w\in ^{\{\}}p_{0-3}\;\&\; a=[\![\mathbf{a}]\!]\;\&\;a\in ^{\{\}}[\![sang]\!](v) \;\&\; & \\ & \langle [\![sp]\!],p_{0-2}\rangle\in ^{\{\}}[\![\mathbb{crt}]\!](w)\} & (\cdot)_{\Omega},(\cdot)_{\omega} \\ =: & c_4 & \\ \end{array}\)

\(\begin{array}{rlr} (c_5) & c_4[\![[\bot\omega\in\top\omega\parallel]]\!]^g \\ := & [\![\lambda I\lambda j(Ij\wedge \bot\omega(j)\in\top\omega\{I\})]\!]^g(c_4) & A2,c[\![\cdot]\!]^g \\ = & [\![\lambda j(Ij\wedge \bot\omega(j)\in\top\omega\{I\})]\!]^{g[I/c_4]} & D2.2.\lambda \\ = & ^{\chi}\{j\;|\;j\in ^{\{\}}c_4 \;\&\; [\![\bot\omega]\!](j)\in \{[\![\top\omega]\!](k)\;|\; k\in ^{\{\}}c_4\}\} & D2.2,D2.1 \\ = & ^{\chi}\{j\;|\;j\in ^{\{\}}c_4 \;\&\; (j_2)_{\omega}\in \{(k_1)_{\omega}\;|\; k\in ^{\{\}}c_4\}\} & df.\{-|-\}, D2.1.i.[\![\bot a_n]\!], \\ & & D2.1.i.[\![\top a_n]\!]\\ = & ^{\chi}\{\langle\langle a,w,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle p_{0-2},v\rangle\rangle \;|\;w\in ^{\{\}}p_{0-3}\;\&\; a=[\![\mathbf{a}]\!]\;\&\;a\in ^{\{\}}[\![sang]\!](v) \;\&\; & \\ & \langle [\![sp]\!],p_{0-2}\rangle\in ^{\{\}}[\![\mathbb{crt}]\!](w) \;\&\; ((\langle\langle a,w,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle p_{0-2},v\rangle\rangle)_2)_{\omega}\in & \\ & \{((\langle\langle a,w,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle p_{0-2},v\rangle\rangle)_1)_{\omega}\;|\; w\in ^{\{\}}p_{0-3}\;\&\; a=[\![\mathbf{a}]\!]\;\&\;a\in ^{\{\}}[\![sang]\!](v) \;\&\; & \\ & \langle [\![sp]\!],p_{0-2}\rangle\in ^{\{\}}[\![\mathbb{crt}]\!](w)\}\} & df. c_4 \\ = & ^{\chi}\{\langle\langle a,w,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle p_{0-2},v\rangle\rangle \;|\;w\in ^{\{\}}p_{0-3}\;\&\; a=[\![\mathbf{a}]\!]\;\&\;a\in ^{\{\}}[\![sang]\!](v) \;\&\; & \\ & \langle [\![sp]\!],p_{0-2}\rangle\in ^{\{\}}[\![\mathbb{crt}]\!](w) \;\&\; (\langle p_{0-2},v\rangle)_{\omega}\in & \\ & \{(\langle a,w,p_{0-3}\rangle)_{\omega}\;|\; w\in ^{\{\}}p_{0-3}\;\&\; a=[\![\mathbf{a}]\!]\;\&\;a\in ^{\{\}}[\![sang]\!](v) \;\&\; & \\ & \langle [\![sp]\!],p_{0-2}\rangle\in ^{\{\}}[\![\mathbb{crt}]\!](w)\}\} & (\cdot)_n \\ = & ^{\chi}\{\langle\langle a,w,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle p_{0-2},v\rangle\rangle \;|\;w\in ^{\{\}}p_{0-3}\;\&\; a=[\![\mathbf{a}]\!]\;\&\;a\in ^{\{\}}[\![sang]\!](v) \;\&\; & \\ & \langle [\![sp]\!],p_{0-2}\rangle\in ^{\{\}}[\![\mathbb{crt}]\!](w) \;\&\; v\in & \\ & \{w\;|\; w\in ^{\{\}}p_{0-3}\;\&\; a=[\![\mathbf{a}]\!]\;\&\;a\in ^{\{\}}[\![sang]\!](v) \;\&\; \langle [\![sp]\!],p_{0-2}\rangle\in ^{\{\}}[\![\mathbb{crt}]\!](w)\}\} & (\cdot)_{\omega} \\ = & ^{\chi}\{\langle\langle a,w,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle p_{0-2},v\rangle\rangle \;|\;w\in ^{\{\}}p_{0-3}\;\&\; a=[\![\mathbf{a}]\!]\;\&\;a\in ^{\{\}}[\![sang]\!](v) \;\&\; & \\ & \langle [\![sp]\!],p_{0-2}\rangle\in ^{\{\}}[\![\mathbb{crt}]\!](w) \;\&\; v\in \{w\;|\; w\in ^{\{\}}p_{0-3}\;\&\; \langle[\![sp]\!],p_{0-2}\rangle\in ^{\{\}}[\![\mathbb{crt}]\!](w)\}\} & simp. \\ =: & c_6 & \\ \end{array}\)

\(\begin{array}{rlr} (c_6) & c_5[\![[\top\omega\in\bot\omega\parallel]]\!]^g \\ := & [\![\lambda I\lambda j(Ij\wedge \top\omega(j)\in\bot\omega\{I\})]\!]^g(c_5) & A2,c[\![\cdot]\!]^g \\ = & [\![\lambda j(Ij\wedge \top\omega(j)\in\bot\omega\{I\})]\!]^{g[I/c_5]} & D2.2.\lambda \\ = & ^{\chi}\{j\;|\;j\in ^{\{\}}c_5 \;\&\; [\![\top\omega]\!](j)\in \{[\![\bot\omega]\!](k)\;|\; k\in ^{\{\}}c_5\}\} & D2.2,D2.1 \\ = & ^{\chi}\{j\;|\;j\in ^{\{\}}c_5 \;\&\; (j_1)_{\omega}\in \{(k_2)_{\omega}\;|\; k\in ^{\{\}}c_5\}\} & df.\{-|-\}, D2.1.i.[\![\bot a_n]\!], \\ & & D2.1.i.[\![\top a_n]\!]\\ = & ^{\chi}\{\langle\langle a,w,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle p_{0-2},v\rangle\rangle \;|\;w\in ^{\{\}}p_{0-3}\;\&\; a=[\![\mathbf{a}]\!]\;\&\;a\in ^{\{\}}[\![sang]\!](v) \;\&\; & \\ & \langle [\![sp]\!],p_{0-2}\rangle\in ^{\{\}}[\![\mathbb{crt}]\!](w) \;\&\; v\in \{w\;|\; w\in ^{\{\}}p_{0-3}\;\&\; \langle[\![sp]\!],p_{0-2}\rangle\in ^{\{\}}[\![\mathbb{crt}]\!](w)\} \;\&\; & \\ & ((\langle\langle a,w,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle p_{0-2},v\rangle\rangle)_1)_{\omega}\in \{((\langle\langle a,w,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle p_{0-2},v\rangle\rangle)_2)_{\omega}\;|\; w\in ^{\{\}}p_{0-3}\;\&\; & \\ & a=[\![\mathbf{a}]\!]\;\&\;a\in ^{\{\}}[\![sang]\!](v) \;\&\; \langle [\![sp]\!],p_{0-2}\rangle\in ^{\{\}}[\![\mathbb{crt}]\!](w) \;\&\; v\in \{w\;|\; w\in ^{\{\}}p_{0-3}\;\&\; & \\ & \langle[\![sp]\!],p_{0-2}\rangle\in ^{\{\}}[\![\mathbb{crt}]\!](w)\}\} & df. c_4 \\ = & ^{\chi}\{\langle\langle a,w,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle p_{0-2},v\rangle\rangle \;|\;w\in ^{\{\}}p_{0-3}\;\&\; a=[\![\mathbf{a}]\!]\;\&\;a\in ^{\{\}}[\![sang]\!](v) \;\&\; & \\ & \langle [\![sp]\!],p_{0-2}\rangle\in ^{\{\}}[\![\mathbb{crt}]\!](w) \;\&\; v\in \{w\;|\; w\in ^{\{\}}p_{0-3}\;\&\; \langle[\![sp]\!],p_{0-2}\rangle\in ^{\{\}}[\![\mathbb{crt}]\!](w)\} \;\&\; & \\ & (\langle a,w,p_{0-3}\rangle)_{\omega}\in \{(\langle p_{0-2},v\rangle)_{\omega}\;|\; w\in ^{\{\}}p_{0-3}\;\&\; a=[\![\mathbf{a}]\!]\;\&\;a\in ^{\{\}}[\![sang]\!](v) \;\&\; & \\ & \langle [\![sp]\!],p_{0-2}\rangle\in ^{\{\}}[\![\mathbb{crt}]\!](w) \;\&\; v\in \{w\;|\; w\in ^{\{\}}p_{0-3}\;\&\; & \\ & \langle[\![sp]\!],p_{0-2}\rangle\in ^{\{\}}[\![\mathbb{crt}]\!](w)\}\} & (\cdot)_n \\ = & ^{\chi}\{\langle\langle a,w,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle p_{0-2},v\rangle\rangle \;|\;w\in ^{\{\}}p_{0-3}\;\&\; a=[\![\mathbf{a}]\!]\;\&\;a\in ^{\{\}}[\![sang]\!](v) \;\&\; & \\ & \langle [\![sp]\!],p_{0-2}\rangle\in ^{\{\}}[\![\mathbb{crt}]\!](w) \;\&\; v\in \{w\;|\; w\in ^{\{\}}p_{0-3}\;\&\; \langle[\![sp]\!],p_{0-2}\rangle\in ^{\{\}}[\![\mathbb{crt}]\!](w)\} \;\&\; & \\ & w\in \{v\;|\; w\in ^{\{\}}p_{0-3}\;\&\; a=[\![\mathbf{a}]\!]\;\&\;a\in ^{\{\}}[\![sang]\!](v) \;\&\; \langle [\![sp]\!],p_{0-2}\rangle\in ^{\{\}}[\![\mathbb{crt}]\!](w) \;\&\; & \\ & v\in \{w\;|\; w\in ^{\{\}}p_{0-3}\;\&\; \langle[\![sp]\!],p_{0-2}\rangle\in ^{\{\}}[\![\mathbb{crt}]\!](w)\}\} & (\cdot)_{\omega} \\ = & ^{\chi}\{\langle\langle a,w,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle p_{0-2},v\rangle\rangle \;|\;w\in ^{\{\}}p_{0-3}\;\&\; a=[\![\mathbf{a}]\!]\;\&\;a\in ^{\{\}}[\![sang]\!](v) \;\&\; & \\ & \langle [\![sp]\!],p_{0-2}\rangle\in ^{\{\}}[\![\mathbb{crt}]\!](w) \;\&\; v\in \{w\;|\; w\in ^{\{\}}p_{0-3}\;\&\; \langle[\![sp]\!],p_{0-2}\rangle\in ^{\{\}}[\![\mathbb{crt}]\!](w)\} \;\&\; & \\ & w\in \{v'\;|\; a\in ^{\{\}}[\![sang]\!](v')\} & simp. \\ =: & c_6 & \\ \end{array}\)

\(\begin{array}{rlr} (c_7) & c_6[\![^{\top}[p\;|\;p=\top\omega\parallel]]\!]^g \\ := & [\![\lambda I\lambda j\exists p\exists i(j=(p \,^{\top}\oplus i)\wedge Ii\wedge p=\top\omega\{I\})]\!]^g(c_6) & A2,c[\![\cdot]\!]^g \\ = & [\![\lambda j\exists p\exists i(j=(p \,^{\top}\oplus i)\wedge Ii\wedge p=\top\omega\{I\})]\!]^{g[I/c_6]} & D2.2.\lambda \\ = & ^{\chi}\{j\;|\;\exists q\exists i(j=\langle q\cdot i_1, i_2\rangle \;\&\; i\in ^{\{\}}c_6 \;\&\; q= ^{\chi}\{[\![\top\omega]\!](k)\;|\;k\in ^{\{\}}c_6\}\} & D2.2,D2.1 \\ = & ^{\chi}\{\langle q\cdot i_1, i_2\rangle\;|\;i\in ^{\{\}}c_6 \;\&\; q= ^{\chi}\{(k_1)_{\omega}\;|\;k\in ^{\{\}}c_6\}\} & df.\{-|-\}, D2.1.i.[\![\top a_n]\!]\\ = & ^{\chi}\{\langle\langle q,a,w,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle p_{0-2},v\rangle\rangle \;|\;w\in ^{\{\}}p_{0-3}\;\&\; a=[\![\mathbf{a}]\!]\;\&\;a\in ^{\{\}}[\![sang]\!](v) \;\&\; & \\ & \langle [\![sp]\!],p_{0-2}\rangle\in ^{\{\}}[\![\mathbb{crt}]\!](w) \;\&\; v\in \{w\;|\; w\in ^{\{\}}p_{0-3}\;\&\; \langle[\![sp]\!],p_{0-2}\rangle\in ^{\{\}}[\![\mathbb{crt}]\!](w)\} \;\&\; & \\ & w\in \{v'\;|\; a\in ^{\{\}}[\![sang]\!](v')\} \;\&\; q=^{\chi}\{((\langle\langle a,w,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle p_{0-2},v\rangle\rangle)_1)_{\omega}\;|\;w\in ^{\{\}}p_{0-3}\;\&\; & \\ & a=[\![\mathbf{a}]\!]\;\&\;a\in ^{\{\}}[\![sang]\!](v) \;\&\; \langle [\![sp]\!],p_{0-2}\rangle\in ^{\{\}}[\![\mathbb{crt}]\!](w) \;\&\; & \\ & v\in \{w\;|\; w\in ^{\{\}}p_{0-3}\;\&\; \langle[\![sp]\!],p_{0-2}\rangle\in ^{\{\}}[\![\mathbb{crt}]\!](w)\} \;\&\; w\in \{v'\;|\; a\in ^{\{\}}[\![sang]\!](v')\}\}\} & df. c_6 \\ = & ^{\chi}\{\langle\langle q,a,w,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle p_{0-2},v\rangle\rangle \;|\;w\in ^{\{\}}p_{0-3}\;\&\; a=[\![\mathbf{a}]\!]\;\&\;a\in ^{\{\}}[\![sang]\!](v) \;\&\; & \\ & \langle [\![sp]\!],p_{0-2}\rangle\in ^{\{\}}[\![\mathbb{crt}]\!](w) \;\&\; v\in \{w\;|\; w\in ^{\{\}}p_{0-3}\;\&\; \langle[\![sp]\!],p_{0-2}\rangle\in ^{\{\}}[\![\mathbb{crt}]\!](w)\} \;\&\; & \\ & w\in \{v'\;|\; a\in ^{\{\}}[\![sang]\!](v')\} \;\&\; q=^{\chi}\{(\langle a,w,p_{0-3}\rangle)_{\omega}\;|\;w\in ^{\{\}}p_{0-3}\;\&\; a=[\![\mathbf{a}]\!]\;\&\; & \\ & a\in ^{\{\}}[\![sang]\!](v) \;\&\; \langle [\![sp]\!],p_{0-2}\rangle\in ^{\{\}}[\![\mathbb{crt}]\!](w) \;\&\; v\in \{w\;|\; w\in ^{\{\}}p_{0-3}\;\&\; & \\ & \langle[\![sp]\!],p_{0-2}\rangle\in ^{\{\}}[\![\mathbb{crt}]\!](w)\} \;\&\; w\in \{v'\;|\; a\in ^{\{\}}[\![sang]\!](v')\}\}\} & (\cdot)_n \\ = & ^{\chi}\{\langle\langle q,a,w,p_{0-3}\rangle,\langle p_{0-2},v\rangle\rangle \;|\;w\in ^{\{\}}p_{0-3}\;\&\; a=[\![\mathbf{a}]\!]\;\&\;a\in ^{\{\}}[\![sang]\!](v) \;\&\; & \\ & \langle [\![sp]\!],p_{0-2}\rangle\in ^{\{\}}[\![\mathbb{crt}]\!](w) \;\&\; v\in \{w\;|\; w\in ^{\{\}}p_{0-3}\;\&\; \langle[\![sp]\!],p_{0-2}\rangle\in ^{\{\}}[\![\mathbb{crt}]\!](w)\} \;\&\; & \\ & w\in \{v'\;|\; a\in ^{\{\}}[\![sang]\!](v')\} \;\&\; q=^{\chi}\{w\;|\;w\in ^{\{\}}p_{0-3}\;\&\; a=[\![\mathbf{a}]\!]\;\&\;a\in ^{\{\}}[\![sang]\!](v) \;\&\; & \\ & \langle [\![sp]\!],p_{0-2}\rangle\in ^{\{\}}[\![\mathbb{crt}]\!](w) \;\&\; & \\ & w\in \{v'\;|\; a\in ^{\{\}}[\![sang]\!](v')\}\} & simp. \\ =: & c_7 & \\ \end{array}\)
